column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Bavette's is one of several great steakhouses in Chicago
column2: and one visit in and you'll see why.  The meat is very flavorful
column4: and seasoned well.  One thing not to miss when you dine here is their shrimp cocktail.  It's big enough to share
column5: or if you want to fire down the entire thing yourself (respect) go for it.  As far as the steak goes
column6: opt for the bone in ribeye
